bill.title: Relating To The Hawaii Code Of Military Justice.
bill.description: Adopts a new Hawaii Code of Military Justice to promote order and discipline in the state military forces by fostering an independent military justice system and updating nonjudicial punishment and courts-martial procedures. Effective 1/1/2023. (CD1)

referrals.name: Public Safety, Intergovernmental and Military Affairs

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to PSM, JDC.
The committee(s) on PSM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-08-22 1:00PM; Via Videoconference.

The committee(s) on PSM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PSM were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, DeCoite, Baker, Riviere, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from PSM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2256) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDC.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC will hold a public decision making on 03-03-22 9:30AM; Via Videoconference.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Keohokalole, Acasio, Gabbard, Kim, Lee; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3145) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-08-22.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Fevella). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 425) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading
Referred to CMV, JHA, FIN, referral sheet 24
Bill scheduled to be heard by CMV on Wednesday, 03-16-22 10:30AM in House conference room 430 Via Videoconference.

The committees on CMV recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Ohno, Ganaden, Branco, B. Kobayashi, Kong, Tarnas; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Morikawa, McDermott.
Reported from CMV (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1122-22) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JHA.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JHA with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Branco, Ilagan, McKelvey, Ohno excused (4).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Monday, 03-21-22 2:00PM in House conference room 325 Via Videoconference.

The committees on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi, Ichiyama, D. Kobayashi, LoPresti, Lowen, McKelvey, Nakamura, Takumi, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tokioka.
Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1329-22) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ohno, Quinlan excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 03-31-22 2:30PM in House conference room 308 Via Videoconference.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Yamashita, Branco, Ilagan, B. Kobayashi, Marten, Nishimoto, Perruso, Sayama, Tam, Todd, Wildberger; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Eli, Holt, McDermott.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1776-22), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Costales, D. Kobayashi excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 492).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 742).
Senate Conferees Appointed: DeCoite Chair; Rhoads Co-Chair; Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 880).
House Conferees Appointed: Ohno, Matayoshi, B. Kobayashi Co-Chairs; Ganaden, Morikawa, McDermott.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 729).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-28-22 10:35AM; Conference Room 229.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) DeCoite, Rhoads; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Ohno, Matayoshi, B. Kobayashi, Ganaden, Morikawa; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McDermott.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 41-22).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-03-22.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 41-22) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-03-22 .
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with Representative(s) Ganaden voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kapela, Perruso voting no (2) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 946).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 824).
Enrolled to Governor.
